events.title: Historic Shift: Women Enter Combat as First Mixed Battery Trains for Duty
events.description: It was on 25th April, 1941, that regulations were put into force making women eligible for operational duties. In May, 1941, the first mixed battery began its training and it became operational on 21st August, 1941.

events.title: Strategic Shift: New Command Center Opens in Baghdad Amid WWII Leadership Changes
events.description: Office was made in August, 1942, during the visit to the Middle East of the Prime Minister and Chief of the Imperial General Staff. I took up my appointment as Commander-inChief on 21st August; General Headquarters opened in Baghdad on 15th September, 1942.

events.title: Mission Successfully Completes Round Trip to Manila Amidst Nighttime Challenges
events.description: 325. The Mission arrived at Manila shortly after dawn on 17th August. The return journey, following the same route, was completed on 21st August, crossing occupied territory once again by night.
